title: Bug 4329 - No results when searched via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)
description:
When searching via the package view selection and dialog, no results are returned. However, the search works fine when done through the context menu in the packages view.

Expected Behavior:
- The search should first attempt to find the Java element, and if it fails, it should display the element name instead of the fully qualified name.

Notes: 
- The package view initializes the Search dialog with the fully qualified name.
OB: When searching for declarations using the package view selection and dialog, no results are found.
EB: When searching for declarations using the package view selection and dialog, the search should first attempt to find the Java element. If it fails to find the Java element, it should display the element name instead of the fully qualified name.
SR:
1. Open the package view.
2. Select a package.
3. Open the search dialog.
4. Enter the search query for declarations.
5. Observe that no results are returned.
